title: Requires local boards of elections to verify the number of enrolled members of a party in an election district
summary: Requires local boards of elections to verify the number of enrolled members of a party in an election district and reject all petitions where there are no enrolled members of a party in such district.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         2692

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 20, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by M. of A. PRETLOW -- read once and referred to the Commit-
         tee on Election Law

       AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation  to  requiring  the  local
         boards of election to verify the number of enrolled members of a party
         in such districts and reject all petitions where there are no enrolled
         members of a party in such districts

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Subdivision 1 of section  6-154  of  the  election  law  is
    2  amended to read as follows:
    3    1.  Any petition filed with the officer or board charged with the duty
    4  of receiving it shall be presumptively valid if it is in proper form and
    5  appears to bear the requisite number of signatures, authenticated  in  a
    6  manner  prescribed  by  this  chapter, PROVIDED, HOWEVER, THAT THE LOCAL
    7  BOARD VERIFIES THE NUMBER  OF  ENROLLED  MEMBERS  OF  A  PARTY  IN  SUCH
    8  DISTRICTS  AND REJECTS ALL PETITIONS WHERE THERE ARE NO ENROLLED MEMBERS
    9  OF SUCH PARTY IN SUCH DISTRICTS.
   10    S 2. This act shall take effect on the first of November next succeed-
   11  ing the date on which it shall have become a law.





        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD02987-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to requiring the local boards of election to verify the number of enrolled members of a party in such districts and reject all petitions where there are no enrolled members of a party in such districts
